meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The preceding chapter explained the basics of math.
meanings.sent2: The preceding lesson was about history.
meanings.sent3: The preceding puzzle was so easy, it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The preceding footsteps echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The preceding sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: Going before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The preceding events led to the final outcome.
meanings.sent2: The preceding days were filled with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The preceding joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The preceding waves crashed against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The preceding melody lingered in the air long after the music stopped.

meanings.definition: Coming before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The preceding guests arrived early for the party.
meanings.sent2: The preceding months were full of anticipation.
meanings.sent3: The preceding question stumped the entire class.
meanings.sent4: The preceding thunder signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The preceding aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
